description.en:
Jaeyoung Ha, a young professor at K University's Department of Business Administration. His lectures and kindness were top quality and he's quite popular among the teachers at the university. However, he has been keeping a secret about being an otaku who is obsessed over some animated girl. Then one day, when a student discovers that he's an otaku who is a Dakimakura, his peaceful daily life fell apart.

altTitles.ja: 転コロ

description.en: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games, high school student Mikagami​ Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle, he's given only the Copy skill, which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!
description.es:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Kouji Mikagami, memiliki nilai pelajaran biasa dan kemampuan atletik biasa, tapi "dia tidak banyak kalah" dalam bermain game, entah kenapa saat bermain game dia tiba-tiba dipanggil ke dunia lain. Sebuah cerita yang dimulai dengan apa yang terjadi. Meskipun mengkonsumsi 1.000 batu ajaib tingkat tinggi untuk melakukan pemanggilan, fakta bahwa ia hanya memiliki "Skill Copy" kemampuan terlemah membuat marah pendeta, dan akhirnya Mikagami dijadikan budak gladiator di Colosseum. Mikagami yang kesal dengan situasi yang tiba-tiba menyadari bahwa situasinya seperti dalam game, dan dengan kemampuan terlemahnya dia akan membuat budak harem di dunia lain.
description.es-la:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.

title.en: The Good Deeds of Old Adventurer Kane

altTitles.es: El buen obrar del señor Kane

altTitles.en: Good Deeds of Kane the Old Guy

altTitles.es: Las buenas obras del señor Kane

altTitles.ja: おっさん冒険者ケインの善行

altTitles.zh-hk: 大叔冒險者凱恩的善行

description.en:
A story about a kind man who deserves much better than what his little ambition has given him.   
  
Kane is a middle-aged and unambitious adventurer who, while in the middle of herb gathering, finds the rare item『Resurrection fruit』.  
  
Kane thinks about selling it and turn it into money, but he meets a girl seeking medicine to save her companion’s life. Since she looks like Altena, his late childhood friend, he gives it in exchange for small change.  
  
Actually, the girl is the strongest adventurer Anastrea, who people call The Sword Princess. The next day, Kane suddenly gets an invitation to join an S rank party, beats down the strongest and the worst monster, miraculously gains lots of money, and finally gets a confession by a 13 years old saint.  
  
Kane’s simple life will change completely because of his encounter with Anastrea.
description.es:
La historia de un hombre gentil que merece mucho más de lo que su poca ambición le ha otorgado.   
  
Kane, un aventurero de edad media, se encuentra en medio de una recolección de hierbas y da un objeto raro, [La Fruta de la Resurrección].   
  
Kane piensa en venderlo y convertirlo en dinero, pero conoce a una chica que busca medicina para salvar la vida de su compañera. Considerando que se parece a Altena, su difunta amiga de la infancia, se la otorga a cambio de un pequeño pago.   
  
En realidad, la chica es la aventurera más poderosa, Anastrea, denominada por la gente "La Princesa de la Espada".  
  
Al día siguiente, Kane de repente recibe una invitación para unirse a un grupo de rango S, vence al más fuerte y peor monstruo, milagrosamente gana mucho dinero y finalmente recibe la confesión de una santa.   
  
La vida simple de Kane cambiará completamente debido a su encuentro con Anastrea.

altTitles.en: The Thing Which Has Fallen From The Sky

altTitles.ja: そらのおとしもの

altTitles.pt-br: Sora no Otoshimono – Caiu do céu

description.en: Sakurai Tomoki is a normal student whose motto is "normal is the best". If there is one thing abnormal, it is that he often dreams of a girl whose face he cannot even remember, and when he wakes up from that dream, he would always be crying. He tried leaving it as just a dream… but one day, from the sky, an angel descended.
description.es: Me llamo Tomoki Sakurai. Mi lema es "La paz es lo mejor". ¿No es lo mejor lo normal?　Una de las cosas que no es normal... el sueño que tengo a diario; un sueño sobre una chica cuyo rostro no puedo recordar. Dejé el asunto, pensando que era sólo un sueño... Pero aquel día, un ángel cayó del cielo.
description.ja: 俺の名前は桜井智樹。モットーは「平和が一番」。普通が一番じゃあございませんか？　一つだけ普通じゃないもの…といえば、俺の良く見る夢。顔さえ思い出せない女の子の夢。たかが夢だと放っておいたんだが…。その日、空から、天使が降ってきた。
description.pt-br: Sakurai Tomoki tem tido o mesmo sonho estranho desde que ele era criança e acordava chorando. Sugata, um veterano em sua escola, acredita que o sonho de ser o novo continente. Mais tarde, naquela noite, enquanto espera sob as cerejeiras por Sohara e Sugata, seus amigos de infância, quando algo cai em sua direção e dentro da cratera havia um anjo.

altTitles.ja: お嬢さんと家政夫

description.en:
The last thing Sooha wants in her life is a man.   
She’s sick of her mother calling about boyfriend problems, of friends trying to set her up on dates, of girls waiting for their Prince Charming. But when a broke and homeless man offers to keep house in exchange for temporary housing, Sooha finds herself saying yes to a man for the first time in her life. After all, who wouldn’t want to come home to warm homemade dinners, clean sheets, and freshly ironed clothes?
description.pt-br: A última coisa que Sooha quer na sua vida é um homem. Ela está cansada de sua mãe ligando sobre problemas com o namorado, de amigos tentando a arranjar encontros, de garotas esperando pelo seu Príncipe Encantado. Mas quando um sem-teto e falido se oferece para cuidar de sua casa em troca de um lugar para morar temporariamente, Sooha se encontra dizendo sim para um homem pela primeira vez na vida. Afinal de contas, quem não iria querer voltar para casa com jantares quentinhos, cama limpa, e roupas recentemente passadas?

altTitles.ja: アンラッキーヤングメン

description.en:
Tokyo, 1968: between political turmoil and student riots N, a man with a criminal past, 
casually meets T, a young comedian intent on making a career in the film industry. 
T wants to shoot "Unlucky Young Men", a chronicle of a disillusioned Japanese youth
ready to do anything to realize their dreams; to finance the film, 
the two begin to plan attacking a van carrying 300 million yen...

altTitles.th: เปลี่ยนฝันร้ายให้กลายเป็นรัก

description.en: Ever since breaking up with one of the most popular boys at her university, Kan's life has become hell. He turned everyone against her, and the isolation and gossip has finally pushed her to the edge. However, she's suddenly confessed to by her classmate, the attractive but brash Yuya. He says he wants to help her, but for all his lightheartedness, he seems to have some demons of his own…

title.en: Chou Ten-chan! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Koushiki Anthology

altTitles.ja: 超てんちゃん！ NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE公式アンソロジー

altTitles.en: OMGkawaiiAngel! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Official Anthology

description.en:
The Internet's Angel’s advent upon this manga world!!!

The super popular game「NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE」's first official anthology!

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

altTitles.ja: サカモト デイズ

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
description.fr:
Taro Sakamoto est un assassin légendaire, le meilleur d'entre tous, craint par tous les gangsters, adulé par ses pairs. Mais un beau jour... il tombe amoureux ! S'ensuivent retraite, mariage, paternité... et prise de poids.
Sakamoto est aujourd'hui patron d'une petite épicerie de quartier et coule des jours heureux avec sa famille. Mais lorsque son passé le rattrape sous les traits de Shin, un jeune assassin télépathe, Sakamoto reprend du service...
Et malgré son apparence, il est toujours aussi charismatique lorsqu'il passe à l'action !
description.ja: 町の商店を営むふくよかな男・坂本太郎。その正体は全ての悪党が恐れ、憧れた元・伝説の殺し屋!!　襲い来る危険から家族と日常を守る、坂本の日々とは…!?
description.ru: Таро Сакамото был профессиональным киллером. Другие наёмники им восхищались, а злодеи боялись. Но однажды… Сакамото влюбился! Завязал с криминалом, женился, стал отцом и в итоге… Разжирел! Толстый дядька из соседнего магазина — в прошлом непревзойдённый убийца! Сможет ли он уберечь свою семью от опасности? Приготовьтесь к новой остросюжетной комедии!
description.pt-br: Taro Sakamoto era o assassino supremo, temido pelos vilões e admirado pelos assassinos. Mas um dia... ele se apaixonou! Aposentadoria, casamento, paternidade e depois… Sakamoto engordou! O cara gordinho que administra a loja do bairro é na verdade um ex-assassino lendário! Ele pode proteger sua família do perigo? Prepare-se para experimentar um novo tipo de série de comédia de ação!

title.en: Maou ni Natta node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono suru

altTitles.ru: Я стал Повелителем Демонов и создал подземелье, чтобы проводить время с девушками-монстрами

altTitles.zh: 魔王建造地下城转生到异世界建造人外娘

altTitles.ko: 마왕이 됐으므로 던전을 만들고 인외아가씨와 훈훈해진다

altTitles.ja-ro: Maō ni Nattanode, Dungeon Zōtte Jingaimusume to Honobono suru

altTitles.en: I Became the Demon Lord so I Created a Dungeon and Spend Heartwarming Time There with Non-Human Girls
Now I'm a Demon Lord! Happily Ever After with Monster Girls in My Dungeon

description.en:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time…. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
description.ja: 異世界転生したユキは、気付くとダンジョンの魔王になっていた!? チートな強さで人外娘達を助けたり、超便利なカタログ通販（？）でダンジョンに凶悪な罠を仕掛けたりとやりたい放題。自由と平和を守るため、快適＆最凶ダンジョン造りを目指せ！ 人気WEB小説コミカライズ!!
description.es-la: Antes de darme cuenta, me había convertido en el guardián de una mazmorra, un Señor Demonio. De repente, estaba en un mundo peligroso con monstruos gigantes holgazaneando, luchando por la existencia de la mazmorra para no morir, pero por alguna razón estaba pasando un buen momento ... ¿Cómo resultó esto? El protagonista, Yuki, usa sus sentidos audaces y agudos y pasa el tiempo con una niña dragón suprema y una niña vampiro; A veces riendo, a veces enojándose, pasando días haciendo lo que le gusta.
description.pt-br:
Antes que eu percebesse, eu havia me tornado o guardião de uma masmorra, um Lorde Demônio.  De repente, eu estava em um mundo perigoso com monstros gigantes vagando por aí, lutando por sua existência, então pensei em desenvolver a masmorra para não morrer, mas – por algum motivo eu estava me divertindo bastante….  Como ficou assim?

 O protagonista, Yuki, tendo que viver naquele mundo agora, usa seus sentidos ousados ​​e afiados e passa o tempo com uma suprema garota dragão e uma garota vampira;  Às vezes rindo, às vezes com raiva, passando dias fazendo o que gosta.

title.en: Henkyou Gurashi no Maou, Tensei shite Saikyou no Majutsushi ni naru

altTitles.ja: 辺境ぐらしの魔王、転生して最強の魔術師になる

altTitles.en: The Demon King of the Frontier Life, Reincarnated to Become the Strongest Mage

description.en:
There was once a mage called The Lone Demon King on the frontier. He was just a creature that never grew old, but was also loved by the villagers as something of a guardian deity. However, he was destroyed by a magic organization that sees his existence as dangerous. 200 years later, he is reincarnated as the second son of an aristocrat and obtains the strongest magic power.

“Let’s pretend to be a human this time.”

However, being a human lover, he didn’t particularly think of revenge and has decided to pretend to be human in this life. In his past life, he was the guardian deity of a region, and in this life, he’s a local aristocrat who lacks common sense. He doesn’t know how to take it easy. As the second son of an aristocrat, he is loved by his family and friends, and while he is regarded as a master of magic in the magic guild, he becomes an ‘Immortal Mage’ behind the scenes.
description.ja: 生まれ持った強大な魔力を恐れられ「魔王」として討伐された魔術師・ディーン＝ノスフェラトゥ。200年後、男爵家の次男として目覚めたディーンは、膨大な魔力と前世の知識で最強魔術師として成り上がることに！
description.vi:
Có một ma pháp sư được mệnh danh là Ma vương độc tôn ở vùng biên giới. Anh ta là một sinh vật không bao giờ già đi, nhưng lại nhận được sự yêu quý của dân làng tựa như một vị thần hộ mệnh. Tuy nhiên, một tổ chức ma pháp đã coi anh ta là mối nguy hiểm và đã tiêu diệt anh. 200 năm sau, anh tái sinh làm con trai thứ hai của một quý tộc và trở thành ma pháp sư mạnh nhất.
“Lần này hãy giả vờ là một người bình thường!”
Là một người yêu con người, anh ta không nghĩ đến việc trả thù và đã quyết định giả vờ làm người bình thường trong kiếp này.
Kiếp trước, anh là thần hộ mệnh của một vùng, kiếp này, anh là một quý tộc địa phương, nhưng anh không biết những đạo lý đời thường, không biết làm sao cho nó trở nên dễ dàng hơn.
Là con trai thứ hai của một quý tộc, anh được gia đình và bạn bè yêu quý, trong khi đó, anh cũng được tôn thành bậc thầy ma pháp trong hội ma pháp, anh trở thành một ‘Immortal Mage’ một cách bí mật.

altTitles.ja: アタゴオル物語

description.en: Atagoul Monogatari takes place in a fantasy world where humans and cats can talk to each other. The story revolves around the adventures of the protagonist, Hideyoshi, and his friends.

Shavonne is a writer who lives in a run-down apartment in the streets of the slums. One day, strange memos start showing up at his front door. Before he can uncover the mystery behind them, he encounters a beautiful young man that keeps peeling onions on the staircase next to his unit. After accepting a dinner invitation from the young man, Shavonne discovers a dead body in his host’s bedroom…

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.ja: さらなみ

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

altTitles.ja-ro: Otome Game Tensou, Ore ga Heroine de Kyuuseishu!?

altTitles.en: Transferred to another world, but I'm saving the world of an Otome game!?
Transferred to another world, but I'm the savior!?

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲー転送、俺がヒロインで救世主!?
異世界転送、俺が乙女ゲーで救世主?!

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉送乙女遊戲，我變女主角兼救世主！ ？
異世界傳送，我在乙女遊戲當救世主！ ？

description.en:
Because of his little sister, high school student Tarou (alias) is transferred to an otome game as the heroine. The more he tries to avoid the handsome love interests, the further he advances into their love routes!  
  
In the end, will he be able to return to his original world?!  
And will he be able to protect his chastity?!

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

title.en: Jichou shinai Moto Yuusha no Tsuyokute Tanoshii New Game

altTitles.zh-hk: 不自重前勇者強大又輕鬆的NEW GAME

altTitles.zh: 不自重前勇者强大又轻松的NEW GAME

altTitles.ja: 自重しない元勇者の強くて楽しいニューゲーム

altTitles.en: The Former Legendary Hero Will Enjoy His Second Life Without Restraint

description.en:
Orion is a former hero who has been reborn in a different world he once saved as a "hero".

Taking advantage of his second round of heroic heroism, he takes on the world's strongest and wisest maid who was once in the same party with him, picks up a slave girl, and trains her with "heroic-style power leveling"!

Even if you are attacked by a thief monster girl, you can easily convert her and get her a friend!

The former hero who never takes responsibility for his own actions, who has acquired a luxurious mansion, the most powerful equipment, beautiful women, fame, and everything else he needs to live his life the way he wants to, has started a new game of strength and fun!

The Chilseok festival is coming soon and there will be a gathering at the Hotel Ojakgyo to celebrate the event. However, in reality, the event is actually for alphas and omegas come together to have an orgy!  
  
Im E-Jun is a rare, high- quality omega. Omegas of his stature are desired by many. Even so, Im E-Jun has always liked his close friend, Kang Do-hoon, who is an alpha. However, Sihun, another alpha, has his eyes set on Im E-Jun.  
  
What is to happen when the day of the festival finally comes?

title.en: Blue Archive - The Adventure of Game Development Department!

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブゲーム開発部だいぼうけん！

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game

altTitles.ru: Blue Archive: Грандиозное приключение отдела разработки игр!

description.en: From the hit game Blue Archive, comes a spin-off manga featuring the Game Development Department! Where Momoi, Midori, Yuzu and Aris share their days of youth, friendship, and clumsy moments. A heartwarming, cute and funny youth-comedy crafted by the master of comedy, Asato Mizu!
description.ja: 人気ゲーム「ブルーアーカイブ」よりゲーム開発部のスピンオフが登場！モモイ、ミドリ、ユズ、アリスの4人が送る青春、友情、ぽんこつの日々...。コメディの名手・水あさとが手掛ける、笑えて泣けて可愛い青春コメディ！
description.ru: Спин-офф манга по мотивам популярной игры Blue Archive, в которой девочки из отдела разработки игр делятся смешными историями о своей юности и дружбе. Это душевная и милая история, созданная мастером комедии Мидзу Асато!
description.vi: Bộ truyện chuyển thể từ trò chơi đang làm mưa làm gió "Blue Archive" với sự xuất hiện của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game! Nơi Momoi, Midori, Yuzu và Arisu cùng nhau sẻ chia những năm tháng của tuổi trẻ, tình bạn và những khoảnh khoắc vụng về. Đây là một câu chuyện ấm lòng, hài hước và dễ thương từ Bậc thầy Truyện hài Mizu Asato!

altTitles.ja: ハイド・アンド・シーク

description.en:
The neglected grandson of a wealthy CEO, Sooha has a dark past that has resulted in a split personality. Sooha as himself can be cranky and distrustful, but his alter ego, Ray, is quite violent. This isn’t without good reason: the CEO has been orchestrating attacks on Sooha/Ray in order to find an invaluable jewel Ray has hidden. As part of his plan to find the gem, the CEO hires Soohyun to pretend to be Sooha’s bodyguard. Yet the more Sooha and Soohyun spend time with each other, the more both let down their guard…  


---
description.pt-br:
Sooha é o neto negligenciado de um grande empresário. Um rapaz lindo e com uma cor de cabelo incomum. Por causa de eventos que aconteceram quando criança acabou resultando dentro dele a existência de uma segunda personalidade chamada “Lay” que não é nada "boazinha". O avô de Sooha contrata o jovem e belo rapaz Soohyun como guarda-costas, e ambos elaboram um plano para lidar com a dupla personalidade de Sooha. E quanto mais Sooha e Soohyun passam tempo juntos, mais eles baixam a guarda. O que "Lay" fará com esses dois?  


---

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

description.en:
Wan’s got a face that scares everyone away before he can really become friends with anyone. So when Ha-woon befriends Wan on his first day at his new school, Wan is elated. Ha-woon must be an angel! It doesn’t take long, though, for Ha-woon to betray him in a terrible way, and Wan discovers Ha-woon might be more devil than angel. But then an accident happens that gives Wan a second chance at friendship with his angel. And it all starts with one big, fat lie.  
  
French   
Wan a un visage qui fait peur à tout le monde, avant de pouvoir vraiment devenir ami avec n'importe qui. Alors, quand Ha Woon se lie d'amitié avec Wan lors de son premier jour dans sa ouvelle école, Wan est ravi. Ha Woon doit être un ange ! Cela ne prend pas longtemps, cependant, pour que Ha Woon le trahisse d'une manière terrible, Wan découvre que Ha Woon pourrait être plus diabolique qu'un ange. Mais alors un accident se produit ce qui donne à Wan une seconde chance d'amitié avec son ange. Et tout commence par un très gros mensonge.

Is it true that a dragon-courted human has appeared?
He only went to see it once. In Akan's life, it doesn't matter whether a human being is beautiful or not, but after meeting Hereis, their lives become intertwined!
Will Hereis, with his fine body and full beauty, be able to capture Akan?

altTitles.ja: 破壊神マグちゃん

description.en: The God of Destruction Magu Menueku has been summoned by the Chaos Cult. Humanity's last hope is the honorable Holy Knights! The battle to save mankind…took place hundreds of years ago… But now a girl out in the country named Ruru releases the legendary god of destruction who had been trapped in a magical jewel! Will the natto-eating, destruction beam-blasting Magu-chan fill the world with complete chaos? This heart-warming, destructive comedy series is ready to explode onto the scene!
description.pt: O Deus da Destruição Magu Menueku foi convocado pelo Culto ao Caos. A última esperança da humanidade são os honoráveis Cavaleiros Sagrados! A batalha para salvar a humanidade … aconteceu centenas de anos atrás … Mas agora uma garota no país chamada Ruru libera o lendário deus da destruição que estava preso em uma jóia mágica! Será que os Magu-chan, que comem natto e destruidores de raios, enchem o mundo com o caos completo? Esta série de comédia destrutiva e comovente está pronta para explodir em cena!
description.ru: Бог Разрушения Магу Менуэку был вызван Культом Хаоса. Последняя надежда человечества - почетные Святые Рыцари! Битва за спасение человечества произошла сотни лет назад, но теперь девушка по имени Руру освобождает легендарного бога разрушения, попавшего в ловушку волшебной жемчужины! Сможет ли Магу-чан, стреляющий разрушающим лучом и поедающий натто, наполнить мир полным хаосом? Этот душераздирающий, разрушительный комедийный сериал готов взорваться на сцену!
description.es-la: El Dios de la Destrucción, Magu Menueku, fue invocado por el Culto del Caos. ¡La última esperanza de la humanidad son los honorables Caballeros Sagrados! La batalla para salvar al mundo... toma lugar cientos de años atrás... Pero ahora, ¡una chica del campo llamada Ruru libera al legendario dios de la destrucción el cual estuvo atrapado en una joya mágica! ¿Podrá el devorador de natto y ejecutor de rayos, Magu-chan, llenar el mundo con completo caos? ¡Esta cálida y destructiva comedia está lista para explotar en escena!

description.en: If anyone’s looking for proof that two people can have casual sex and stay friends, look no further than Choi Eui-hyun and Jung Min. First classmates, and now co-workers, the secret ingredient to this 9-year relationship may just be Min’s unique preferences in bed. As someone who has never needed a safe word for anything in his life, Eui-hyun often struggles with Min’s overwhelming demands. Min, on the other hand, sometimes feels frustrated by how much convincing Eui-hyun needs to get kinky with him. But they’ve already lasted nine years, so what’s nine more…right? Or will their differences ultimately drive them apart?
description.es: Si alguien busca pruebas de que dos personas pueden tener sexo casual y seguir siendo amigos, no busque más allá de Choi Eui-hyun y Jung Min. Primero compañeros de clase, y ahora compañeros de trabajo, el ingrediente secreto de esta relación de 9 años puede ser las preferencias únicas de Min en la cama. Como alguien que nunca ha necesitado una palabra segura para nada en su vida, Eui-hyun a menudo lucha con las abrumadoras demandas de Min. Min, por otro lado, a veces se siente frustrada por lo mucho que necesita convencer a Eui-hyun para que se ponga pervertido con él. Pero ya han durado nueve años, así que, ¿qué son nueve más… verdad? ¿O es que sus diferencias acabarán por separarlos?

altTitles.de: Die Tagebücher der Apothekerin - Geheimnisse am Kaiserhof

altTitles.th: สืบคดีปริศนา หมอยาตำรับโคมแดง เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと

description.de: Maomao ist eine unscheinbare Dienerin am Kaiserlichen kaiserlichen Hof. Zumindest bemüht sie sich, so gesehen zu werden. Denn seit sie in den Dienst des Kaisers verkauft wurde, hat die junge Apothekerin alles darangesetzt, ihre Schuld abzuarbeiten, ohne weiteres Aufsehen zu erregen, damit sie bald nach Hause zurückkehren kann. Aber Maomao ist schlau – und viel zu neugierig. Als die Kronprinzen einer nach dem anderen einem mysteriösen „Fluch“ erliegen, mischt sie sich heimlich ein, um das Rätsel zu lösen. Dabei erregt sie die Aufmerksamkeit des Eunuchen Jinshi – und eh sie sichs versieht, wird sie mitten in die Intrigen am Kaiserhof hineingezogen…
description.en: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!
description.fr:
À 17 ans, Mao Mao a une vie compliquée. Formée dès son jeune âge par un apothicaire du quartier des plaisirs, elle se retrouve enlevée et vendue comme servante dans le quartier des femmes du palais impérial! Entouré de hauts murs, il est coupé du monde extérieur. Afin de survivre dans cette prison de luxe grouillant de complots et de basses manœuvres, la jeune fille tente de cacher ses connaissances pour se fondre dans la masse.

Mais, quand les morts suspectes de princes nouveau-nés mettent la cour en émoi, sa passion pour les poisons prend le dessus. Elle observe, enquête… et trouve la solution! En voulant bien faire, la voilà repérée… Jinshi, haut fonctionnaire aussi beau que calculateur, devine son talent et la promeut goûteuse personnelle d’une des favorites de l’empereur. Au beau milieu de ce nid de serpents, le moindre faux pas peut lui être fatal!

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.id: Diculik dan dijual ke harem, Maomao berusaha bertahan dengan kemampuannya beradaptasi. Wawasan yang luas tentang obat-obatan membuat karirnya melompat tinggi, langsung menjadi pelayan pribadi selir kesayangan kaisar!
description.it:
Maomao, una giovane farmacista del quartiere a luci rosse della capitale, viene venduta suo malgrado come sguattera alla corte imperiale. Anche se desidera ardentemente tornare libera, si ritrova a non disdegnare la vita tutto sommato comoda che è riuscita a ritagliarsi a palazzo, dove, senza farsi notare, riesce a proseguire i suoi studi di fitoterapia e sulla preparazione dei veleni. Di fronte a un male che affligge i figli dell’imperatore, Maomao sente tuttavia di farsi avanti e, sfruttando le sue conoscenze, riesce a salvare loro la vita. La ragazza attira così le attenzioni del bel eunuco Jinshi, che ha in mente per lei dei piani ben precisi.

---
Giovani donne vengono spesso vendute per lavorare per un breve periodo nell'harem dell'imperatore. È questo il caso di Maomao, farmacista presso il quartiere a luci rosse. Non ha alcun interesse nel farsi notare a palazzo e preferisce starsene per conto suo a preparare medicine, studiare veleni o fare esperimenti su se stessa. Ma quando a corte si diffonde la voce che i figli dell'imperatore sono destinati a una morte prematura, Maomao non riesce a rimanere indifferente. Mentre cerca di indagare, cattura l'attenzione di misterioso e affascinante ufficiale di alto rango. Ha così inizio la sua particolare carriera.
description.ja:
宮中に名探偵誕生!?

「小説家になろう」発! 
ヒーロー文庫の大人気タイトル『薬屋のひとりごと』が、待望のコミカライズ! 
中世の宮中で下働きをする少女・猫猫(マオマオ)。
花街で薬師をやっていた彼女が、帝の御子たちが皆短命であるこという噂を聞いてしまったところから、物語は動き始める。
持ち前の好奇心と知識欲に突き動かされ、興味本位でその原因を調べ始める猫猫の運命は――…!?
「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です。
description.pl: Maomao, ambitna młoda zielarka, zostaje porwana i trafia do haremu cesarza jako służąca. Aby nie pogarszać sytuacji, w której się znalazła, zataja swoje umiejętności, a nawet fakt, że potrafi czytać i pisać. Tymczasem nowo narodzone dzieci władcy umierają na skutek tajemniczej klątwy. Zielarka szybko orientuje się, że to nie magia, ale trucizna jest przyczyną śmierci niemowląt. Decyduje się ostrzec księżniczki, podrzucając do ich komnat wiadomość o powodach niezwykłej choroby ich dzieci. Dziewczyna nie przypuszcza nawet, jak bardzo ta decyzja zaważy na jej losie. Tym bardziej, że znalazła się w miejscu, w którym nikt nie może czuć się bezpieczny...
description.ru:
В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?! Адаптация одноимённого ранобэ.  


---

- Won the Grand Prize in the Printed Manga category at the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Award 2019.  


---

description.th:
ณ อาณาจักรใหญ่ยักษ์แห่งหนึ่งซึ่งตั้งอยู่ใจกลางทวีป เด็กสาวนางหนึ่งผู้ทำงานเป็นหมอยาในสถานเริงรมย์ย่านโคมแดงอันมีนามว่า ‘เมาเมา’ บัดนี้เกิดจับพลัดจับผลูต้องมาทำงานรับใช้อยู่ในวังหลัง

เธอทำได้เพียงเฝ้ารอให้หมดวาระการทำงานอย่างสงบเสงี่ยมเจียมตัว ด้วยรูปร่างหน้าตาที่ไม่สะสวยจึงมั่นใจเป็นนักหนาว่าตนจะไม่มีวันโดนจักรพรรดิเรียกไปเป็น ‘คู่นอน’ อย่างแน่แท้

แต่ในขณะนั้นเอง โอรสธิดาของจักรพรรดิกลับมีเหตุให้อายุสั้น
พอรู้ว่าสองทารกน้อยที่ยังเหลือรอดกำลังป่วยหนัก เมาเมาจึงลงมือขุดคุ้ยหาสาเหตุ—
description.uk: Ще зовсым юна Мамао досліджує мистецтво лікування травами, мріючи відкрити ліки від усіх недуг. Однак проти своєї волі вона потрапляє в імператорський гарем як служниця. Вона вирішує приховати набуті знання, тому прикидається однією з багатьох неписьменних дівчат. Тим часом діти правителя гинуть за загадкових обставин. Коли весь двір говорить про таємниче прокляття, Маомао розпізнає симптоми отруєння. Але як застерегти зневірених матерів від небезпеки, коли в оточенні імператора голос простого слуги нічого не означає? За воротами Внутрішнього палацу будь-якої миті може статися чергова трагедія. Чи знайде Маомао своє місце в цьому світі, повному інтриг?
description.vi:
Miêu Miêu là một cô gái làm công việc hầu hạ trong cung đình thời phong kiến.
Câu chuyện của chúng ta bắt đầu với việc cô gái từng hành nghề dược sư ở phố hoa này nghe thấy người ta đồn thổi rằng: tất cả những đứa con của Hoàng đế đều đoản mệnh.
Bị thúc đẩy bởi niềm khát khao tri thức và tính hiếu kì cố hữu, Miêu Miêu bắt tay vào tìm hiểu nguyên nhân, xem đó như một cách giải khuây không hơn không kém.
description.zh-hk: 時值中世紀，位處大陸中央的某個大國，有位姑娘名喚貓貓，原本在煙花巷擔任藥師，現在則在後宮當下女。其間，貓貓無意間聽說皇子皆年幼早夭的傳聞，並得知連尚在人世的皇子皇女也身染重病，她於是開始調查其病因──廣獲讚譽的酣暢淋漓推理之作，眾所期盼的第一集終於出版。以中世紀東方為舞臺，「試毒」少女將一一解決宮中發生的懸疑案件！

description.en:
While snow was falling on a holy night, a demon with the looks of a young girl traveled into the village and watched the warm people inside their homes. The demon was surprised when an exorcist spoke to her despite the hatred between the two species; immediately the demon became attracted to the exorcist.

A comforting story that brings together humans and demons.
description.es:
En la nevada de una noche sagrada, una demonio con la apariencia de una niña pequeña se encaminó hacia el pueblo y presenció a la gente cálida en sus hogares. La demonio se sorprendió cuando un exorcista le habló a pesar del odio entre sus mutuas especies; inmediatamente, la demonio se vió atraída al exorcista.  
  
Una historia confortable que junta a humanos y demonios.
description.id:
Saat salju turun pada malam natal, Akuma-chan dengan penampilan seorang gadis muda melakukan perjalanan ke desa dan menyaksikan orang-orang dengan suasana hangat di dalam rumah mereka, pertemua antara Akuma-chan dan pemburu iblis pada malam itu membuat sang Akuma-chan menjadi tertarik pada pemburu iblis, apakah yang akan terjadi diantara mereka berdua?

Kisah menghibur yang menyatukan manusia dan iblis.

description.en: Takeshi is the captain of a club activity that prohibits romance. A devil [succubus] who seduce men appeared under him. How much can he endure in front of a girl who is sexy but far from neat and clean? How far can you go through a pure and uninterrupted love affair?

Alexander, a knight - hunter, during the execution of a task found a man - a dragon with a broken horn. According to him, as a child he had a best friend, and in order to meet him at least one more time, he did not mind sacrificing his horn. The dragon had been waiting for his friend for over ten years to see him again. Alexander did not expect that the dragon offendedly demanded him about the "old promise" …

However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.

description.en: A 34-year-old NEET gets killed in a traffic accident and finds himself in a world of magic. Rather than waking up as a full-grown mage, he gets reincarnated as a newborn baby, retaining the memories of his past life. Before he can even properly move his body, he resolves to never make the same mistakes he made in his first life ever again and instead live a life with no regrets with the new one that was given to him. Because he has the knowledge of a middle-aged man, by the age of two, he has already become a prodigy and possesses power unthinkable for anyone his age and even older. Thus begins the chronicles of Rudeus Greyrat, son of swordsman Paul and healer Zenith, as he enters a new world to become the strongest mage known to man, with powers rivaling even the gods themselves.
description.ru:
34-летнего отаку-затворника выгнали из дома родственники после похорон его родителей. Этот жирный и уродливый девственник без гроша в кармане осознал, что его жизнь подошла к концу. Затем он понял, что его жизнь вообще могла бы быть намного лучше, если бы тот мог избавиться от тёмных страниц своей жизни. Пребывая в сожалениях, мужчина увидел, как грузовик со спящим водителем быстро надвигается на трёх школьников. Собрав все свои силы, он попытался спасти их и погиб.  
  
А открыв глаза, он обнаружил, что переродился в мире меча и магии как Рудеус Грейрат. Получив в этом мире новую жизнь, Рудеус решил, что в этот раз проживёт свою жизнь на полную, безо всяких сожалений!  
  
И так началось приключение человека, пожелавшего заново начать свою жизнь.  
  
Alternative Raw: <http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/23831>
description.es-la: La historia trata sobre un muchacho que se encierra en su casa tras sufrir una enorme humillación pública sin atreverse a salir durante varios años debido a los traumas que esto le ocasionó. Incapaz de soportar esto, se encerró en casa sin querer salir ni volver a ver a sus compañeros y durante años el miedo a salir creció y creció, acabando por convertirse en una carga para su familia… hasta el día en que sus padres murieron y sus hermanos lo expulsaron de su hogar por el parásito en el que se había convertido. En ese momento, aunque tarde, se arrepintió de su actitud y se puso a pensar que su vida podría haber sido decente si él le hubiera puesto más esfuerzo. Justo cuando estaba a punto de iniciar su nuevo cambio, ve un camión en movimiento a gran velocidad dirigiéndose a tres estudiantes de secundaria. Reuniendo todas las fuerzas que tenía logra salvarlos, pero a cambio él termina siendo atropellado por el camión, muriendo al instante. Cuando abrió los ojos, él había reencarnado en un mundo de espadas y magia como Rudeus Greyrat. Nacido en este nuevo mundo, con una nueva vida, Rudeus decidió que, “Esta vez, realmente voy a vivir mi vida al máximo sin arrepentimientos”. De este modo se inicia el viaje de un hombre que anhela reiniciar su vida.

altTitles.ja: ゆゆ式

description.en: This 4-koma style manga features 3 school girls as they hang out and chat. Friendly, clueless Yukari, enthusiastic, childish Yuzuko, and the more level-headed Yui hang out and talk about various subjects, like ketchup and mayonnaise, hands, the sun and more.

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール角明

description.en: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
description.pt-br:
“Quando o desejo do Androide 17 no final do Torneio do Poder leva o mundo a uma Guerra Multiversal, aliados de todos os universos terão que se fortalecer para enfrentar divindades malignas e, desta vez, eles terão que defender todos sem Goku”.

Criado pelos franceses Darkows (roteiro), Reenko (roteiro) e Poissonlabo (desenhista), Dragon Ball Kakumei é um mangá não oficial que conta uma história alternativa se caso o desejo do Androide 17, ao fim do Torneio do Poder, restaurasse os 18 universos que existiam originalmente, levando a uma Guerra Multiversal entre grandes divindades, mas sem a presença de Son Goku.

Com uma arte atípica, em se tratando de um mangá feito por fãs (que geralmente costumam tentar emular os traços de Akira Toriyama), além de uma história com uma narrativa e proposta bem diferente da leveza e simplicidade da obra original, Dragon Ball Kakumei é, sem dúvidas, um dos mangás não oficiais de Dragon Ball mais famosos, ao lado de outros projetos de fãs como Dragon Ball AF e Dragon Ball Multiverse.

description.pt-br: Após anos de desencontros, nosso protagonista reencontra a caloura com quem se dava bem no ensino médio. Porém, aparentemente, ela se tornou uma famosa influenciadora.

description.en: Fang Zhen grew up with a strict mother in a suppressing environment. His father and the mistress died in a car accident. The mistress' young brother, Lu Qi, couldn't accept his sister's death and identity, and was admitted to the hospital for depression. One year later, the fate brought Fang Zhen and Lu Qi together. Ignited by the flame of hatred, Fang Zhen started to bully Lu Qi...

altTitles.ja: ファンタスマゴリア・デイズ

description.en:
Follow the daily life and adventures of Dr. Hoop and his assistant, the robot Lancelot, across the planet Phantasmagoria in these short stories brimming with all sorts of peculiar characters. Experience the unique warmth and creativity Tamura Shigeru has to offer in this nostalgic world of his creation - infused with a touch of both humor and sadness.

---
More exploration of the world of Phantasmagoria, created after Tamura's short animation featuring scenes from the same world: **a piece of PHANTASMAGORIA**.

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

description.es-la: Llega una nueva estudiante a clase que resulta ser muda, al principio es una novedad, pero pronto la gente le deja sola... excepto una nueva amiga, que quizás tenga la peculiaridad de saber lo que la chica muda piensa.

altTitles.ja: 怨み屋本舗

description.en:
The world is filled with cruel scum, ranging from petty thieves to sociopath maniacs. When a vile low-life inflicts pain and suffering on innocent victims, sometimes their anger becomes overwhelming. Whether their damage stems from romance, finance, reputation or even a death, these victims feel trapped in their own skins and lives. 

Those victims who can't stand it anymore call for the mysterious woman Houjou Shiori, owner of Uramiya, the "Revenge Shop". 

The Uramiya specializes in executing revenge schemes. The vengeance their customers request on their bitterly resented enemies could range from financially destroying them, to smearing their social reputation, to even taking their lives. As long as you pay a fair price, the Uramiya will guarantee you get the revenge you deserve.

description.en: As a result of the efforts of the people of Chaldea, the human incineration plan of those who called themselves the Magic King was bitterly stopped at the water's edge, and the destiny of the world seemed to be breathing again. However, suddenly, the singularity of the same level as the singularity so far is observed in modern times. A master who has opened up the future once again puts himself into a layershift to calm down the "subspecies singularities" that appeared in the cursed land "Salem."
description.ru: Халдея во главе с Рицука Фуджимару, мастером, проникшим на проклятую землю «Салем», чтобы ответить на новую «особенность». "Я встретила двух девушек Эбигейл и Лавинию".

description.en:
Because he did not pass his college entrance exam, Kagami Kyosuke cannot stay close to Kojo Hikari, the love of his life. So instead he gets a part-time job near her university and buys an old camera since Hikari is passionate for photography. But as it turns out, that camera also has a secret which will get him involved in all sorts of "exciting" and "awkward" situations especially with Botan Oshikiri, his senpai and co-worker. How will Kyosuke's life play out now?  


---
description.id: Karena dia tidak lulus ujian masuk perguruan tinggi, Kagami Kyosuke tidak bisa tinggal dekat dengan Kojo Hikari, cinta dalam hidupnya. Jadi alih-alih dia mendapatkan pekerjaan paruh waktu di dekat universitasnya dan membeli kamera tua karena Hikari sangat menyukai fotografi. Namun ternyata, kamera itu juga memiliki rahasia yang akan membuatnya terlibat dalam segala macam situasi "menarik" dan "canggung" terutama dengan Botan Oshikiri, senpai dan rekan kerjanya. Bagaimana kehidupan Kyosuke mulai dari sekarang?
description.ru:
Провалившись на вступительных экзаменах в университет, Кагами Кёскэ также потерял возможность сблизиться со своей школьной любовью — Кодзё Хикари. Надеясь сохранить с ней связь, он не только устраивается работать в кафе рядом с её кампусом, но и покупает подержанный полароид, чтобы найти общую тему для разговоров с увлекающейся искусством фотографии Хикари. Однако Кагами не знал, что он приобрел очень необычный фотоаппарат…  


---

title.en: Chiisai Nozomi to Ooki na Yume

altTitles.ja: 小さいノゾミと大きなユメ

description.en: High schooler Nozomi Koiwa wakes up and discovers she’s lost her memories…and a whole lot of height. Now the size of a soda can, she flees from a feline assault into the disgusting den of Yume Okubo, a drunken shut-in NEET who’s terrified of people and hasn’t been outside for months. Between falling beer cans and deadly insect traps, Nozomi survives long enough to convince the airheaded Yume that she’s a figment of her imagination who’s come to save her from hitting rock bottom…all while investigating how she ended up funsized. But despite their differences—height, brains, and otherwise—each half of this quirky combo might just be what the other needs!
description.es-la: La historia sigue la aventura de una estudiante de bolsillo llamada Nozomi en un apartamento compartido con una NEET llamada Yume.

Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.
